name: Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick
about: What it is:A gentle scrub in a targeted stick that exfoliates to target clogged pores and create a smoother, mattified, more even complexion..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Uneven Texture, and Oiliness.Formulation:Scrub.Highlighted Ingredients:- Kaolin Clay: Targets oil and impurities to reduce the look of clogged pores..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This unique scrub contains two types of exfoliators to refine the look of uneven texture and prep the skin to better absorb skincare. The nourishing, intense-cleansing formula reduces the appearance of clogged pores and leaves skin soft to the touch. Try it as a mask for even more pore-perfecting benefits..Clinical Results:In a 1-week consumer perception study:
ingredients: -Kaolin Clay: Targets oil and impurities to reduce the look of clogged pores..-5 Acid Blend: Exfoliates dead skin cells to improve the look of tone and texture. .-Mushroom Extract: Minimizes the look of pores and smooths texture.  ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Sodium Stearate, Hydrated Silica, Kaolin, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Niacinamide, Algin, Mandelic Acid, Fomes Officinalis (Mushroom) Extract, Farnesol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycolic Acid, Galactoarabinan, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Salicylic Acid, Adipic Acid, Sodium Carbonate, Polylysine......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently massage over areas of concern (forehead, nose, cheeks, and chin)..-Rinse thoroughly..-Pat dry. .-Use it as a mask by leaving it on the skin for ten minutes before rinsing. .-For best results, use two to three times per week. ..Warning: .-Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I feel a good appearance in my skin, pores has been improved it's very helpful for oily skin I love it and I will buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is nice and works well for me, but there is so little in the stick! That is why I give it 3 stars...I wish there was more product. I have only used it a few times and I am already almost out. I had to double check that I didn't order a mini..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combination skin and have been using the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick for a little over three weeks now. At first, I was pumped to use this product because it was made for my skin type and promised to reduce pores, oiliness, and uneven texture - perfect! The stick form made it easy to apply and there was no unpleasant fragrance used so there were even more positives. The problem began when I first applied the product. According to the instructions, I can use the exfoliator on dry or damp skin, so I chose damp just to be safe. The product immediately felt very abrasive and harsh on my skin, so I applied more water and used my fingers to spread the product on my nose. It was better, but it defeated the purpose of having the exfoliator in stick form. The product dried down fairly quickly, which I liked, but rinsing it off felt just as abrasive as before and was uncomfortable. I did end up with a smoother nose, but it felt like it wasn't worth it. I have tried to use the Pore Perfecting Stick multiple other times since then, but the result always ends up the same - unsatisfied. I would only recommend this product if you know your skin can handle harsh physical exfoliators.   *I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really unique product as you can use it as an exfoliating cleanser or a face mask. I prefer to use it as a face mask because it has been more effective at unclogging my pores and improving texture that way. I love that it is in a solid stick form so my hands don't get messy when I apply it. It is easy to just swipe on, wait 10 minutes and then rinse off. I have both dry and acne prone skin. This mask helps with removing flaky skin and reducing acne/clogged pores at the same time but because my skin type is dry, I find I can only use this once a week. After I rinse it off it makes my skin feel so smooth without being tight. I have enjoyed using it as a part of my nighttime routine but I also think that for the price it should be more than 15g of product. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick! It does a really great job at exfoliating pores. Although it's a bit of a hassle to rinse everything off, my skin has definitely become visibly cleaner and brighter, and I had less breakouts after using it for 3 times a week. I love how there's no harmful ingredients, so this was perfect for my sensitive skin. I will definitely be buying this in the future! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick!!!!! The packaging is so convenient and easy to use. The product it self works really well for me and exfoliated my face nicely. I've been using it for a couple weeks now and I have seen a difference in my pores. After using this scrub my face feels soft and clean. I would totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick for a while now, and I have to say, I'm really impressed. I love that it's so versatile. One minute I can use it as a quick cleanser to target blackheads on my nose, and the next I can swipe it on and leave it as a mask for a deeper clean. The formula is surprisingly gentle u2013 it's creamy and glides on easily, unlike some masks that feel harsh. Plus, it rinses clean without leaving my skin feeling dry or stripped. My pores appear minimized, and my skin feels overall smoother and clearer. The stick form is so convenient too, perfect for travel or quick touch-ups.  If you're looking for a product that can help with blackheads and keep your pores in check, I highly recommend giving this one a try! Just a heads-up, while it's been gentle on my skin, it might be worth a patch test first if you have sensitive skin because of the exfoliating ingredients.  received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh how much I love Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick! It's a little magic in the tiny package for your face. I'm so happy using this product, it really helped minimize the pores. I waited a few weeks before posting my review and I'm fully satisfied with results.  #trywithtopbox #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: A new must have addition to my purse and routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to cleanse my pores at least once a week.  The stick looks quite deceiving - it looks like a deodorant stick or lip balm but it has to be applied to the skin directly from it - I was shocked at how easily it glides on to the skin. Spreading it is also very easy and it felt really good while exfoliating.   I applied it on my nose and my t-zone where I tend to get more blackheads the first time I used it. It spread like a regular scrub when mixed with water and cleansed my pores easily and while I felt the beads on my skin, it didn't leave my skin looking or feeling scratched like other scrubs often do. My skin looked and felt clean and softer after I washed it off my face.   The instructions say it can also been used as a face mask which I've tried and it works to give an even deeper clean to clogged pores.   I like how my skin looks and feels clean yet hydrated after using the stick in either method of application and I love the convenience of being able to carry it in my purse without the worry of it spilling out into it. I definitely  recommend this product.    I received the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick from Topbox for free to try & give my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks, specifically on my chin area, where I've had a pretty bad hormonal breakout, I am very happy.  I noticed my face starting to clear up within a few uses.  I love the exfoliating factor it has and it's gentle, not harsh.  I like that it's in a stick format as well, it makes for easy application.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes

I did find it a bit rough on my face, so I've started to apply it to my hands and then to my face and that has made a difference and has made it easier for me to apply. I typically worry with products like this as I have super sensitive skin,  but I was excited to receive it in the mail to test. It did not disappoint,  my skin feels insanely soft and looks great. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product kinda scared me at first I have acne bad on my cheeks and chin and an exfoliating scrub product made me nervous. But I've been eager to try a product on my pores they get bad on my nose and forehead. I applied to my skin damp and let it sit for a few minutes before washing off, I would say after a few uses not daily maybe 1-2 times a week , I have noticed a difference and I truly haven't used a product like this. It was fun being in a stick form and I do recommend you give it a try yourself!! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

I have been using it for the past couple weeks and have noticed a significant difference in my blackheads. Even though it is a scrub, it is not harsh at all. Love that it leaves my skin feeling so soft. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

I just wet my face and run the stick over my problem areas and gently massage my face with the scrub. It helps to exfoliate my skin. Afterwards, my skin has a clean feel but not dry. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really surprised how much I enjoyed this product. I thought it would be difficult to get the product on my face but I was able to glide it on with no issues. This would be a great travel item as you wouldn't need to touch it with your hands and it's practically mess free. There was a cooling sensation when I put it on my nose area. I treated it like a mask and waited 10 mins before washing it off. I didn't see immediate results but my skin did feel cleaner and a tighter. My only wish is for this to be bigger or have more product as I can see it being used up pretty fast.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes

reviews.review_title: Where have you been my whole life!?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This little stick makes some big claims. Perfecting? I was blown away. The first time using this, I put it on my nose for ten minutes as a mask. If you are anything like me, you have those pesky sebaceous filaments, that are a constant battle. I rinsed off the product, ribbing as an exfoliant as I went. Dried off my face, leaned in to look in the mirror and... it was completely clear. I have since tried this as an all over face mask, with the same results. I routinely use acids as chemical exfoliants but I have never experienced such awesome results. I will be keeping this product in my arsenal asa weekly mask. An absolute must try. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last week I've noticed much cleaner pores and they're much less noticeable!  I'm really happy with the smooth application, and perfect size to fit in my makeup bag for regular use!  I received this product free from Topbox Cirlce Marketing for testing and review purposes!

reviews.review_title: Pores look finer after a few use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for over 2 weeks now and after each use, I find my pores to be finer. I am hoping for even more definitive results in a few more weeks. This product is simple to use and most of the time I will keep it on as a 5 minute mask over the pores. Cleans the pores well! Size is a bit to the small size, but very good travel size for when I commute. I received this product from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

This stick is super convenient and easy to use. Just swipe it over your problem areas and let it work its magic. The formula contains powerful ingredients like salicylic acid and witch hazel to help unclog pores and reduce their appearance. Plus, it's gentle enough for everyday use. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product free from Topbox and loved the way makes my skin feel so smooth and soft. My skin feels super clean and the pore instantly look smaller.  I was looking for a great new exfoliator and I'm impressed with this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my favorite product right now! I love how easy it is to use. I just apply the it on while at the same time lightly exfoliate. I like to leave it on as a mask for a little bit and let the kaolin clay work its magic and draw out the impurities. I do feel a light tingle sensation but it's not bothersome to me. After 10 minutes, I lightly exfoliate as I cleanse the rest of the product off. My skin feels super clean and the pore instantly look smaller. I wouldn't say I have sensitive skin but I do prefer to use this once or twice a week as the exfoliating grit is a little bigger and I don't want to irritate my skin. I was looking for a great new exfoliator and I'm definitely impressed with this one! Product was gifted. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this brand when it comes to pore treatment, they have the best nose strips I've ever tried, so I was excited when I received this one. The format is convenient, it looks like a roll-on deodorant and at first I thought it was not much product but you can twist it and it will come up. It has a dry texture and I can feel it exfoliating my skin gently. I tried before my night routine a few times, it didn't irritate my skin (which is sensitive) and I can see some improvement in the size of the pores on my nose. I'll definitely continue using it.  I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_text: I was expecting more of a difference after using it but it's not like the before and after they show. Although it did clean out my pores they still look the same and still so noticable. I most likely will not purchase especially for the price and size of the product. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

It's a small product for such a large price and it did clean my pores sort of, I didn't notice that it reduced them or help them much in a big way. It was very gentle on my skin. So it's not something I would purchase but I wouldn't discourage others from giving it a try.

reviews.review_text: I've only used it once so far and I'm really impressed. I have large pores on my nose and chin that I'm conscious about but this cleared them up and smoothed them nicely. Big difference and clean feeling.

reviews.review_title: Great addition to your beauty routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from TopBox Marketing for testing and review purposes.  I really liked this product, which was very easy to use in a wide stick form, with any face product I wish more product was included but this one did last longer than I thought it would. I was happy to find it wasn't abrasive but still exfoliated. I chose to utilize this as a mask to further help select problem areas. The pore perfecting stick had a very light pleasant smell. In combination with Peace Out pore perfecting cleanser I also used, these two products really complimented each other and I did notice some improvement in my skin and the pores in my problem areas seemed to not be as visible. As I always zero in on the problems with my skin, I was happy to notice a change in the appearance of my skin. Despite receiving this product to try out and review for free. I plan on continuing with it and see what more my skin will benefit with longer term use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off, application of this product is super easy given its rounded shape and ability to roll up and down. I was hesitant to use a physical exfoliation as I run on the dry and sensitive side, but the granules are gentle enough that it doesn't irritate my skin. I have been using the Pore Perfecting Stick as a mask a couple of times a week and only in my t-zone area as that is where I have more issues with my pores. I have definitely noticed a difference and found my skin to be smoother with a more even texture. I also haven't noticed it making my skin any more dry than it already is - as stated above, my skin is typically on the drier side. All in all, I am liking the results I see and will continue using it as a mask a couple of times a week.   I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clear results! I've always had pesky blackheads that never wanted to clear up completely. I have tried a variety of products to assist, but nothing has come close to what the Pore Perfecting Stick has accomplished. My nose is clear! I have used product for about a month now and I'm thoroughly impressed. It has a velvety texture, glides on like butter. You can faintly feel tiny beads, but they are very smooth. Don't know how it got the job done but it has! I received this product for free from top box marketing for testing and review purposes.  #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled when I received this. I was a little discouraged by the size, but let me tell you a little goes a long way. My skin looked and felt so clean after using the pore perfecting stick. I didn't have any irritation when using this product and although it exfoliates it isn't to rough. Definitely recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It is extremely soft going on your skin and don't even get me started with how amazing your face feels once you wash it off. With just one use my skin was glowing.This product is 100% a new staple in my skincare routine. If you're considering buying this product do it! It will not disappoint #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this as a mask for 15 minutes and I absolutely loved it! easy clean up in the shower and its great on the go! I used this once and I noticed a difference in my skin. I had clearer skin after just one use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My face feels so clean after using this as! It glides on super easy and exfoliates perfectly ud83dudc95 I just wish it came in a bigger stick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy to use this is! I rub the stick on all over my chin, cheeks and nose as that's where my blackheads and large pores are. I rinse it off right away once a week in the morning and twice a week I use it as a mask by leaving it on for 10 minutes before rinsing while I am using the Peace Out retinol eye patches (a twice weekly routine for me since receiving these products to test and absolutely falling in love!) After a couple weeks my pores are smaller, I have much fewer blackheads and many of my milia white lumps have exfoliated away without causing large scabbing holes like they have with other exfoliators. I recommend the Peace Out line of products for sure. Before this I was using Cerave and Clean&Clear products, but these have converted me from the drug store brands.    I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review.  #freeproduct

This works well to smooth out my skin and minimize my pores! Even with a quick application (not using it as a mask) it worked well on my T zone and made my skin look smooth and tighter and brighter. I really like the packaging as it makes it more precise in application and super easy to use. Really happy that I got to try this #freeproduct with Topbox and Peace Out, I would purchase it myself again!

reviews.review_title: Tiny and faulty packaging! WAY overpriced.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not one to claim that beauty products are overpriced. But this one truly is. The amount you get for $33 CAD is absurd! The stick came broken and I used about 1/4 of the stick with one application!  In terms of the quality of the actual formula, the exfoliation you get is very good, the particles are small and coarse, you cover every inch of your skin. After massaging it in, I did feel like my face was sufficiently exfoliated but for some, I could see this product being way too abrasive for their skin (mine is pretty good at handling intense treatments). I wouldn't recommend this for people with sensitive skin unless you are very gentle with messaging. Overall, my pores felt cleaner and smaller but I do not think the results are worth the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this formula a lot, the stick rolls onto skin really nicely to target specific areas. It made my skin feel really clean after rinsing, loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this! I only wish it came in a two pack or a bigger bottle - however I love this convenient size!  I can't even tell you how great this feels. I have huge pores literally everywhere and extremely texturized skin and this, let me tell you, this helps me so much! I love using this that I have to control myself to using it every other night. Otherwise, I would be using this twice a day and I am just not ready to run out of this anytime soon! I have learnt that I mostly like the effects of this at nighttime. It wash away all of my makeup and such and this is one of my last steps before serums and moisturizer. It really clears my pores and does make them appear smaller! When I use this, I like to slug my face and in the morning, I get this beautiful, clear, hydrated and bright skin. I LOVE it! Especially on days where I rather sleep in and not put on a face full of makeup - it has been a god send. So easy to use, fits in your hands so nicely, mess free application - Honestly, I didn't think I would be overly wow'd by this I am obsessed! #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick is a great 10 minute mask.  60s with combination skin is I.  Skin feels tighter with a healthy glow, pores seem smaller/cleaner.  I have also been using it as a spot mask and it has been working in the nose area with STUBBORN blackheads.  I like masking in the pm as I like nicely exfoliated skin to absorb my nighttime serums and cream. Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick prepares my skin for success with the fine lines and wrinkles that I am treating.  As far as blemishes go, I occasionally have an eruption but I can see how this can help.  Packaging is cute and is eye catching.  :)

I used it for twice on my T-zone last week and I can see a huge difference in my skin. The pores seems tighter, the skin is rejuvenated and most of all blackheads are almost gone. reviews.review_text: I use this as a spot treatment when I see a pimple coming. Next morning, nothing!  I am super thrilled, especially since I got this as a free product to review. #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: Say hello to smoother, radiant skin with Peace Out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick as a #freeproduct from Topbox. #freeproduct  I've been using Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick, and it's changed my skincare routine. Here's a quick rundown: Personal Experience: I applied it in the evening after cleansing. Scent and Application: No overpowering scent, smooth application. Performance: Noticed a visible improvement in pore size and texture. Gentle: Suitable for sensitive skin; no irritation. Value: Though slightly pricey, the results make it worthwhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this right after using the pore perfecting cleanser.  First of all, I want to mention how cute the packaging is.  It's like a little exfoliating, pore cleaning stick. I used it twice a week, on my exfoliating nights.  After cleansing my face, I really went in with this on my trouble areas where my pores are clogged.  It felt very rough but in a good way. I left it on my trouble areas for about 10 minutes. I didn't feel like it did anything. But honestly, when I took it off, my face felt so squeaky, clean and smooth. Visually, I didn't see much of a difference after only the first night, but I did a little bit after the second night. It made my skin a little red after using, but it's because I was really getting in there and scrubbing with it. I can't wait to see the long-term results of this product. It had a very subtle, clean scent. Almost no scent at all.  I have really dry skin everywhere and eczema and this time of year gets really bad on my face especially, and because of how exfoliating this product felt on my face I was worried it was going to really dry it out so right after I applied some hyaluronic acid serum and 100% aloe vera right after. The next day my face was still smooth. Love this. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct I received the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick from Topbox and I loved using it. I use it after cleansing my face and noticed it really helped with my T-zone area. After using this product, my pores are reduced and my skin feels much softer smoother. Easy application and would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick u2013 A Portable Pore!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick has become a must-have in my skincare arsenal, offering a convenient and effective solution for on-the-go pore care.  This stick is not your typical skincare product; its innovative design makes it incredibly easy to use. The packaging is sleek and compact, making it perfect for travel or a quick touch-up during the day.  The formula, enriched with ingredients like salicylic acid and niacinamide, targets pores and helps control excess oil. I've noticed a visible reduction in the appearance of pores after regular use. The stick glides smoothly onto the skin, leaving a lightweight and non-greasy finish.  What sets this product apart is its versatility. It can be used as a primer before makeup application or as a quick fix for midday shine. I appreciate its mattifying effect without causing any dryness or discomfort.  The Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick is fragrance-free, which is a plus for those with sensitive skin. I also appreciate that it's cruelty-free, aligning with ethical skincare practices.  While the price point might be a bit higher than some alternatives, the convenience and effectiveness make it a worthwhile investment for anyone struggling with pore concerns.  In conclusion, if you're looking for a practical, portable, and potent solution for pore perfection, the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick deserves a spot in your skincare routine. It's become a staple in mine, and I highly recommend it for those looking to achieve smoother, refined skin. #freeproduct

reviews.review_text: #freeproduct i received the Peace Out report perfecting stick from Topbox. both my boyfriend and i tried it out!  I used the perfecting stick before washing my face and i noticed an immediate difference and improvement. it was very easy to use and I use it when i was my face before I would to bed. The pore perfecting stick  are true to their name and help to lift, firm and exfoliate my face . highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct  I recently tried the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick, and it's become a handy addition to my skincare routine. The stick format makes it incredibly easy to target specific areas with enlarged pores.  Upon application, the formula feels smooth, and I appreciate the convenience of being able to use it on-the-go. While I haven't used it long enough to gauge long-term effects, I noticed a subtle improvement in the appearance of my pores immediately after application.  The stick is travel-friendly, and its straightforward application makes it suitable for quick touch-ups throughout the day. If you're looking for a convenient solution to address pore concerns on the spot, the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick is worth considering.

The Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick is a game-changer for clearing out pores. I incorporated it into my nighttime routine, and the results were impressive. The stick format makes application a breeze, and I love the lightweight feel on my skin. By morning, my pores appeared visibly clearer, contributing to an overall smoother complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very quickly impressed with the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick. The application was a breeze, easily gliding over the skin to target the troublesome areas. The stick format makes it super easy to use - no mess, no fuss! It helped refine my skin texture and minimize the appearance of my pours with minimal effort.   Overall, I'm very impressed with the product because of its user-friendly design and its ability to enhance skin texture with ease of application. #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: Great quality that leave you feeling fresh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely quality for yhe packaging and the product its self if very nice easy to use takes up almost no space and simple to apply. I also really enjoyed that this stick exfoliate but for once did not leave my face feeling dry. Free Sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scrub! I have these small bumps on my forehead, but I've noticed a difference after using this product. Nice size too :) P.S. I'm a sucker for this stick format. It's so fun to  apply. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to apply and leaves my pores feeling better than ever. I love how it's a stick form so you're not over doing it. One layer at a time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the stick format as it was easy to apply and I didn't need to dig into a tub (I hate getting product under my nails). The exfoliant is quite harsh but application does glide really well. I tried both application options and prefer this as a mask option as I saw better results. It left my skin feeling clean and soft and not at all dry. I would recommend this to anyone that has oily or combination skin as it may irritate those with sensitive or dry skin. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but the moment I opened it, it was no longer intact. Didn't get a chance to try it; I'll be returning it.

This pore perfecting stick is great! It gets rid of my pores and blackheads. I had so many blackheads and it's worked to remove a lot of them. #freeproduct I used this during the day. It smells good. I can't believe this exists. It cleans my pores really well. I'd recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how you can control the product because of the packaging. You can apply more pressure for more of an exfoliation or a lighter pressure just to target certain areas. You can also wear it as a mask. With super oily skin I use this 2x a week! Love it!

reviews.review_title: Buying a second as I write!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is super simple to use, and gentle enough for my sensitive skin. It genuinely reduces acne through all stages of my cycle. The stick format is perfect for those who like having longer nails, no goop stuck underneath. 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really surprised with this! Not only does it feel nice but it's actually made the pores around my cheeks and nose look smaller too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My pores look cleaner than ever before. I can't believe the difference it has made. I'm definitely going to keep using it to make my pores less visible. It's become a must-have in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It works best for oily skin if I'm honest. My mom tried it and the dry result made her skin uncomfortable. For me though, I would repurchase it. My pores look cleaner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting this product to work, but not this well, and only after one treatment!   Upon first application I was actually nervous about the little granules, they felt sort of scratchy initially and I was a bit worried my face would be angry and red once I rinsed it off. I couldn't have been more wrong! My skin was so much more calm looking than it normally is, HUGE reduction in redness and my pores were like night and day. I really wish I'd taken a before/after picture of my nose, but I honestly thought it would take at least a few uses to see legitimate results. This is the real deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's ok...pretty small for the price and doesn't work any better than my other Polish exfoliants.

reviews.review_title: An Unrivaled Solution for Clearer Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to being gifted by peaceoutskincare I was able to get my hands on this product. What truly sets this product apart is its long-term impact. With consistent use, I've noticed a remarkable reduction in the appearance of my pores. My skin's texture has become noticeably smoother, and those stubborn blackheads that once seemed invincible have met their match. Even more impressively,  seems to inhibit the reformation of clogs, a feat that many pore-clearing products struggle to achieve.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you haven't tried it, try it. It does the same thing as my exfoliate her of $100 for a quarter of the price it works in instants and I literally seen it remove dead skin cells the first time I used it. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an easy product to use! Love that's it's travel friendly.  I used this product twice a week. I have oily skin that enhances my pores and this product really helped in minimizing the look of pores. Would recommend using it as a mask I think that was more effective for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how practical and easy it is use. I can easily apply the product straight to my face. The grit is super gentle and doesn't feel rough. The packaging is cute and space friendly. It doesn't have a scent and the ingredients are so skin friendly. I love that it doubles as a face mask and for my acne prone skin it's the perfect addition to my double cleanser routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently sent this product in PR and I have never loved a product more than I love the Peace Out Pore Perfecting Stick. It has truly made an impact when it comes to making my makeup application apply a flawlessly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never written a review on here before, but for this product I just had to.  Oh my gosh.  I think it's literally the best skincare product I have ever used.  I have very sensitive, reactive skin and let me tell you:  instant improvement from the first use.  Going forward it's an essential for me.  WOW.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in my gratis, tried it on myself and my boyfriend. We left it on as a mask for 10 mins, both are pores looked smaller and the skin was much smoother. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Peace Out Skincare. I used this product twice a week. I love how easy to apply this is and how a little goes a long way. I also tried to use this as a mask, leaving this on for 10 minutes and rinsing. I liked the results that I got, not only is this product gentle on my skin, it also leaves my skin feeling smoother and with less breakouts. Will be adding this to my regimen for sure!
